main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Caracas, Venezuela on December 13, 1965, by a military observer.
interesting points: The object was described as a flaming spherical shape with an orange-red color., The observer reported a slight tail about one-third of the object's diameter., The object was visible for about 40 seconds before it was lost from sight due to building obstructions., No sound was reported during the observation., The sighting conditions were clear with no optical aids used.
witness description: Robert D. Vinson, 2/LT, US Army, age 27
